item.title: Sheila add a quote by Sarah Addison Allen
item.description: "Happiness is a risk. If you’re not a little scared, then you’re not doing it right." -- Sarah Addison Allen

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Stewart O'Nan
item.description: "She didn't want to be one of those old ladies obsessed with death, hearing it in every tick of the clock and creak of the floorboards, as if it were prowling around the house like a burglar" -- Stewart O'Nan

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Molly Wizenberg
item.description: "Even the Thanksgiving when her parents had just divorced, Hoosier Pie made the cut. ...They also, incidentally, made a pumpkin pie, but it fell on the floor, a classic example of survival of the fittest" -- Molly Wizenberg

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Michael Perry
item.description: "Seed catalogs are responsible for more unfulfilled fantasies than Enron and Playboy combined." -- Michael Perry

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "Control is a nice concept, little more." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "I can shake off everything as I write; my sorrows disappear, my courage is reborn." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Sheila add a quote by Hilary Mantel
item.description: "He will remember his first sight of the open sea: a gray wrinkled vastness, like the residue of a dream." -- Hilary Mantel
